00016 inline bool ScoreSortByDate(const Settings::ScoreInfo& p1, const Settings::ScoreInfo& p2)
00017 {
00018     return p1.timestamp > p2.timestamp;
00019 }
00020 
00021 inline bool ScoreSortByValue(const Settings::ScoreInfo& p1, const Settings::ScoreInfo& p2)
00022 {
00023     if(p1.playerName == p2.playerName)
00024         return p1.score > p2.score;
00025     else
00026         return p1.playerName > p2.playerName;
00027 }
00028 
00029 inline void WriteCampaignDescription(gui::TextBox* text, Settings::PartySetting& party)
00030 {
00031     text->Write(gui::GuiString("Carte:       %s\n"
00032                                "Mode:        %s\n"
00033                                "Temps:       %d\n"
00034                                "Joueurs:     %d\n"
00035                                "Objectif:    %d point(s)",
00036                                party.playMap.name.c_str(),
00037                                AppManager::UnsignedToPlayMod(party.playMod).c_str(),
00038                                party.playTime,
00039                                party.playerCount,
00040                                party.winCond));
00041 }
00042 
00043 inline void WriteScore(gui::TextBox* textbox, vector<Settings::ScoreInfo>& scores)
00044 {
00045     using namespace boost::posix_time;
00046 
00047     stringstream text;
00048 
00049     text << "Les Scores enregistrer" << endl;
00050     text << "Nom | Date | Type | Carte | Temps | Score" << endl;
00051     text << endl;
00052 
00053     for(unsigned i = 0; i < scores.size(); i++)
00054     {
00055         Settings::ScoreInfo& si = scores[i];
00056 
00057         text
00058                 << si.playerName << " | "
00059                 << from_time_t(si.timestamp) << " | "
00060                 << AppManager::UnsignedToPlayMod(si.playMod) << " | "
00061                 << si.levelName << " | "
00062                 << si.playTime << " sec | "
00063                 << si.score << " point(s)" << endl;
00064     }
00065 
00066     textbox->Write(text.str());
00067 }
00068 
00069 AppManager::AppManager()
00070 {
00071     m_gameEngine = new SDLDevice;
00072 
00073     globalSettings.ReadSetting();
00074 
00075     SetupVideoMode();
00076     SetupSound();
00077 }
00078 
00079 AppManager::~AppManager()
00080 {
00081     globalSettings.SaveSetting();
00082 
00083     if(!globalSettings.noaudio)
00084         FMOD_System_Release(m_fmodsys);
00085 
00086     delete m_gameEngine;
00087 }
00088 
00089 void AppManager::SetupVideoMode()
00090 {
00091     m_gameEngine->Window(CAPTION_TITLE,
00092                          globalSettings.video.screenSize,
00093                          globalSettings.video.bits,
00094                          globalSettings.video.fullScreen,
00095                          globalSettings.video.usePpe ? 0 : globalSettings.video.antialiasing);
00096 
00097     if(!Shader::CheckHardware() && globalSettings.video.usePpe)
00098     {
00099         globalSettings.video.usePpe = false;
00100 
00101         m_gameEngine->Window(CAPTION_TITLE,
00102                              globalSettings.video.screenSize,
00103                              globalSettings.video.bits,
00104                              globalSettings.video.fullScreen,
00105                              globalSettings.video.antialiasing);
00106     }
00107 
00108     m_eventMng = m_gameEngine->GetEventManager();
00109     m_guiManager = m_gameEngine->GetGuiManager();
00110     m_sceneManager = m_gameEngine->GetSceneManager();
00111     m_fpsMng = m_gameEngine->GetFpsManager();
00112     m_ppeManager = m_gameEngine->GetPostProcessManager();
00113 
00114 
00115     if(globalSettings.video.usePpe
00116        && globalSettings.video.antialiasing
00117        && FrameBufferObject::CheckHardware())
00118     {
00119         Rtt* ppeRtt = m_ppeManager->GetRtt();
00120         ppeRtt->FBO_SetUseRenderBuffer(true);
00121         ppeRtt->FBO_SetMultisamplesCount(globalSettings.video.antialiasing);
00122     }
00123 
00124     m_fpsMng->SetRunFps(60);
00125 
00126     Texture::ResetCache();
00127 
00128     SetupMenuGui();
00129 
00130     SetupBackgroundScene();
00131 }
00132 
00133 void AppManager::SetupSound()
00134 {
00135     m_fmodsys = NULL;
00136 
00137     if(!globalSettings.noaudio)
00138     {
00139         FMOD_System_Create(&m_fmodsys);
00140         FMOD_System_SetOutput(m_fmodsys, FMOD_OUTPUTTYPE_DSOUND);
00141         FMOD_System_Init(m_fmodsys, 100, FMOD_INIT_NORMAL, 0);
00142 
00143         FMOD_RESULT res = FMOD_System_CreateStream(m_fmodsys, SOUND_GONG,
00144                                                    FMOD_LOOP_OFF | FMOD_2D | FMOD_HARDWARE,
00145                                                    0, &m_gongSound);
00146 
00147         if(res != FMOD_OK)
00148             throw tbe::Exception("AppManager::AppManager; %s (%s)",
00149                                  FMOD_ErrorString(res),
00150                                  SOUND_MAINTHEME);
00151 
00152         res = FMOD_System_CreateStream(m_fmodsys, SOUND_MAINTHEME,
00153                                        FMOD_LOOP_NORMAL | FMOD_2D | FMOD_HARDWARE,
00154                                        0, &m_mainMusic);
00155 
00156         if(res != FMOD_OK)
00157             throw tbe::Exception("AppManager::AppManager; %s (%s)",
00158                                  FMOD_ErrorString(res),
00159                                  SOUND_MAINTHEME);
00160     }
00161 }

00604             m_guiManager->GetControl<gui::KeyConfig > (itt->first, MENU_SETTING_KEYS)

00614     {
00615         m_controls.settings.usePpe->Push("Désactiver", false).Push("Activer", true);
00616         m_controls.settings.usePpe->SetCurrent(globalSettings.video.usePpe);
00617 
00618         m_controls.settings.fullscreen->Push("Fenêtrer", false).Push("Plein-écran", true);
00619         m_controls.settings.fullscreen->SetCurrent(globalSettings.video.fullScreen);
00620     }
00621 
00622     {
00623         int cutAA = globalSettings.video.antialiasing;
00624 
00625         map<int, int> AAAvailable;
00626         AAAvailable[0] = 0;
00627         AAAvailable[2] = 1;
00628         AAAvailable[4] = 2;
00629         AAAvailable[8] = 3;
00630         AAAvailable[16] = 4;
00631 
00632         m_controls.settings.antiAliasing->
00633                 Push("Désactiver", 0).
00634                 Push("2x", 2).
00635                 Push("4x", 4).
00636                 Push("8x", 8).
00637                 Push("16x", 16)
00638                 ;
00639 
00640         m_controls.settings.antiAliasing->SetCurrent(AAAvailable[cutAA]);
00641     }
00642 
00643     {
00644         vector<Vector2i> availableScreen = SDLDevice::GetAvilableSceeenSize();
00645         unsigned curSizeIndex = 0;
00646 
00647         for(unsigned i = 0; i < availableScreen.size(); i++)
00648         {
00649             if(screenSize == availableScreen[i])
00650                 curSizeIndex = i;
00651 
00652             stringstream ss;
00653             ss << availableScreen[i].x << "x" << availableScreen[i].y << "x32";
00654 
00655             m_controls.settings.screenSize->Push(ss.str(), availableScreen[i]);
00656         }
00657 
00658         m_controls.settings.screenSize->SetCurrent(curSizeIndex);
00659     }
00660 
00661     // Menu campaign
00662 
00663     m_controls.campaign.playerName->SetLabel(globalSettings.profile.name);
00664 
00665     for(unsigned i = 0; i < globalSettings.availablePlayer.size(); i++)
00666         m_controls.campaign.playerSelect->Push(globalSettings.availablePlayer[i].name, i);
00667 
00668     m_controls.campaign.playerSelect->SetCurrent(tools::rand(0, globalSettings.availablePlayer.size()));
00669 
00670 
00671     // Temps de la partie
00672     m_controls.playmenu.playerCount->SetValue(4);
00673 
00674     m_controls.playmenu.timeSelect->
00675             Push("60 sec", 60).
00676             Push("2 min", 60 * 2).
00677             Push("5 min", 60 * 5).
00678             Push("20 min", 60 * 20).
00679             Push("Infinie", 0);
00680 
00681     m_controls.playmenu.timeSelect->SetCurrent(1);
00682 
00683     // Mod de la partie
00684     m_controls.playmenu.modSelect->
00685             Push("Frag", FRAG).
00686             Push("Alone", ALONE).
00687             Push("Team", TEAM);
00688 
00689     m_controls.playmenu.modSelect->SetCurrent(0);
00690 
00691     UpdateGuiContent();
00692 }
00693 
00694 void AppManager::UpdateGuiContent()
00695 {
00696     // Campaign
00697 
00698     m_controls.campaign.levelSelect->DeleteAll();
00699 
00700     unsigned campMapSize = min(globalSettings.campaign.maps.size(), globalSettings.profile.index);
00701     for(unsigned i = 0; i <= campMapSize; i++)
00702     {
00703         string label = "Niveau " + tools::numToStr(i + 1);
00704         m_controls.campaign.levelSelect->Push(label, globalSettings.campaign.maps[i]);
00705     }
00706 
00707     {
00708         Settings::PartySetting& party = globalSettings.campaign.maps[campMapSize];
00709 
00710         WriteCampaignDescription(m_controls.campaign.description, party);
00711     }
00712 
00713     // Ball a jouer
00714 
00715     m_controls.playmenu.playerSelect->DeleteAll();
00716 
00717     for(unsigned i = 0; i < globalSettings.availablePlayer.size(); i++)
00718         m_controls.playmenu.playerSelect->Push(globalSettings.availablePlayer[i].name, i);
00719 
00720     m_controls.playmenu.playerSelect->SetCurrent(tools::rand(0, globalSettings.availablePlayer.size()));
00721 
00722     // Carte a jouer
00723 
00724     m_controls.playmenu.mapSelect->DeleteAll();
00725 
00726     for(unsigned i = 0; i < globalSettings.availableMap.size(); i++)
00727     {
00728         m_controls.playmenu.mapSelect->Push(globalSettings.availableMap[i].name, i);
00729         m_controls.edit.mapSelect->Push(globalSettings.availableMap[i].name, i);
00730     }
00731 
00732     m_controls.playmenu.mapSelect->SetCurrent(tools::rand(0, globalSettings.availableMap.size()));
00733 }
00734 
00735 void AppManager::SetupBackgroundScene()
00736 {
00737     using namespace tbe::scene;
00738 
00739     // SCENE -------------------------------------------------------------------
00740 
00741     m_sceneManager->ClearAll();
00742 
00743     LightParallelScene* lightScene = new LightParallelScene;
00744     m_sceneManager->AddParallelScene(lightScene);
00745 
00746     MeshParallelScene* meshScene = new MeshParallelScene;
00747     m_sceneManager->AddParallelScene(meshScene);
00748 
00749     DiriLight* light0 = new DiriLight(lightScene);
00750     m_sceneManager->GetRootNode()->AddChild(light0);
00751 
00752     m_logo = new OBJMesh(meshScene, OBJ_LOGO);
00753     m_sceneManager->GetRootNode()->AddChild(m_logo);
00754 
00755     m_camera = new Camera(Camera::TARGET_RELATIVE);
00756     m_camera->SetRotate(Vector2f(180, 5));
00757     m_sceneManager->AddCamera(m_camera);
00758 
00759     m_sceneManager->SetAmbientLight(0.1);
00760 
00761     // PPE ---------------------------------------------------------------------
00762 
00763     if(globalSettings.video.usePpe)
00764     {
00765         using namespace ppe;
00766 
00767         m_ppeManager->ClearAll();
00768 
00769         // NOTE BlurEffect
00770         #if 0
00771         BlurEffect* blur = new BlurEffect;
00772         blur->SetPasse(4);
00773         m_ppeManager->AddPostEffect("", blur);
00774         #endif
00775 
00776         BloomEffect* bloom = new BloomEffect;
00777         bloom->SetThreshold(0.1);
00778         bloom->SetIntensity(1.0);
00779         bloom->SetBlurPass(10);
00780         m_ppeManager->AddPostEffect("", bloom);
00781 
00782         MotionBlurEffect* mblur = new MotionBlurEffect;
00783         mblur->SetRttFrameSize(tools::next_p2(globalSettings.video.screenSize) / 2);
00784         m_ppeManager->AddPostEffect("", mblur);
00785     }
00786 }
00787 
00788 void AppManager::ProcessMainMenuEvent()
00789 {
00790     if(m_guiManager->GetControl("quickplay")->IsActivate())
00791         m_guiManager->SetSession(MENU_QUICKPLAY);
00792 
00793     else if(m_guiManager->GetControl("campaign")->IsActivate())
00794         m_guiManager->SetSession(MENU_CAMPAIGN);
00795 
00796     else if(m_guiManager->GetControl("setting")->IsActivate())
00797         m_guiManager->SetSession(MENU_SETTING);
00798 
00799     else if(m_guiManager->GetControl("editor")->IsActivate())
00800         m_guiManager->SetSession(MENU_EDIT);
00801 
00802     else if(m_guiManager->GetControl("about")->IsActivate())
00803         m_guiManager->SetSession(MENU_ABOUT);
00804 
00805     else if(m_guiManager->GetControl("score")->IsActivate())
00806         m_guiManager->SetSession(MENU_SCORE);
00807 }
00808 
00809 void AppManager::ProcessCampaignMenuEvent()
00810 {
00811     if(m_controls.campaign.levelSelect->IsActivate())
00812     {
00813         Settings::PartySetting party = m_controls.campaign.levelSelect->GetData()
00814                 .GetValue<Settings::PartySetting > ();
00815 
00816         WriteCampaignDescription(m_controls.campaign.description, party);
00817     }
00818     else if(m_controls.campaign.play->IsActivate())
00819     {
00820         Settings::PartySetting party = m_controls.campaign.levelSelect->GetData()
00821                 .GetValue<Settings::PartySetting > ();
00822 
00823         unsigned indexOfPlayer = m_controls.campaign.playerSelect->GetData().GetValue<unsigned>();
00824 
00825         party.playerName = globalSettings.availablePlayer[indexOfPlayer];
00826         party.playerName.nick = m_controls.campaign.playerName->GetLabel();
00827 
00828         ExecuteCampaign(party);
00829 
00830         SetupBackgroundScene();
00831         m_guiManager->SetSession(MENU_CAMPAIGN);
00832     }
00833 
00834     else if(m_controls.campaign.playerName->IsActivate())
00835         globalSettings.profile.name = m_controls.campaign.playerName->GetLabel();
00836 
00837     else if(m_controls.campaign.ret->IsActivate())
00838         m_guiManager->SetSession(MENU_MAIN);
00839 }
00840 
00841 void AppManager::ProcessPlayMenuEvent()
00842 {
00843     if(m_controls.playmenu.mapSelect->IsActivate());
00844 
00845     else if(m_controls.playmenu.playerSelect->IsActivate());
00846 
00847     else if(m_guiManager->GetControl("play")->IsActivate())
00848     {
00849         unsigned indexOfLevel = m_controls.playmenu.mapSelect->GetData().GetValue<unsigned>();
00850         unsigned indexOfPlayer = m_controls.playmenu.playerSelect->GetData().GetValue<unsigned>();
00851 
00852         Settings::PartySetting playSetting;
00853 
00854         playSetting.playMap = globalSettings.availableMap[indexOfLevel];
00855 
00856         playSetting.playerName = globalSettings.availablePlayer[indexOfPlayer];
00857         playSetting.playerName.nick = m_controls.playmenu.playerName->GetLabel();
00858 
00859         playSetting.playMod = m_controls.playmenu.modSelect->GetData().GetValue<unsigned>();
00860         playSetting.playTime = m_controls.playmenu.timeSelect->GetData().GetValue<unsigned>();
00861 
00862         playSetting.playerCount = m_controls.playmenu.playerCount->GetValue();
00863 
00864         ExecuteGame(playSetting);
00865 
00866         SetupBackgroundScene();
00867         m_guiManager->SetSession(MENU_QUICKPLAY);
00868     }
00869 
00870     else if(m_controls.playmenu.playerName->IsActivate())
00871         globalSettings.profile.name = m_controls.playmenu.playerName->GetLabel();
00872 
00873     else if(m_guiManager->GetControl("return")->IsActivate())
00874         m_guiManager->SetSession(MENU_MAIN);
00875 }
00876 
00877 void AppManager::ProcessEditMenuEvent()
00878 {
00879     if(m_controls.edit.editMap->IsActivate())
00880     {
00881         unsigned index = m_controls.edit.mapSelect->GetData().GetValue<unsigned>();
00882         Settings::MapInfo& mi = globalSettings.availableMap[index];
00883 
00884         Settings::EditSetting es;
00885         es.createNew = false;
00886         es.editMap = mi.file;
00887 
00888         ExecuteEditor(es);
00889 
00890         SetupBackgroundScene();
00891         m_guiManager->SetSession(MENU_EDIT);
00892     }
00893     else if(m_controls.edit.newMap->IsActivate())
00894     {
00895         Settings::EditSetting es;
00896         es.createNew = true;
00897 
00898         ExecuteEditor(es);
00899 
00900         SetupBackgroundScene();
00901         m_guiManager->SetSession(MENU_EDIT);
00902     }
00903     else if(m_controls.edit.ret->IsActivate())
00904         m_guiManager->SetSession(MENU_MAIN);
00905 }
00906 
00907 void AppManager::ProcessSettingMenuEvent()
00908 {
00909     if(m_guiManager->GetControl("keySetting")->IsActivate())
00910         m_guiManager->SetSession(MENU_SETTING_KEYS);
00911 
00912     if(m_guiManager->GetControl("return")->IsActivate())
00913         m_guiManager->SetSession(MENU_MAIN);
00914 
00915     else if(m_guiManager->GetControl("apply")->IsActivate())
00916     {
00917         globalSettings.FillWindowSettingsFromGui(m_guiManager);
00918 
00919         globalSettings.SaveSetting();
00920 
00921         SetupVideoMode();
00922 
00923         m_guiManager->SetSession(MENU_MAIN);
00924     }
00925 }
00926 
00927 void AppManager::ProcessSettingKeyMenuEvent()
00928 {
00929     if(m_guiManager->GetControl("return")->IsActivate())
00930         m_guiManager->SetSession(MENU_SETTING);
00931 
00932     else if(m_guiManager->GetControl("apply")->IsActivate())
00933     {
00934         globalSettings.FillControlSettingsFromGui(m_guiManager);
00935 
00936         m_guiManager->SetSession(MENU_SETTING);
00937     }
00938 }
00939 
00940 void AppManager::ProcessScoreMenuEvent()
00941 {
00942     if(m_controls.score.ret->IsActivate())
00943         m_guiManager->SetSession(MENU_MAIN);
00944 
00945     else if(m_controls.score.sortType->IsActivate())
00946     {
00947         switch(m_controls.score.sortType->GetData().GetValue<int>())
00948         {
00949             case 1:
00950                 std::sort(globalSettings.availableScore.begin(),
00951                           globalSettings.availableScore.end(),
00952                           ScoreSortByDate);
00953                 break;
00954             case 2:
00955                 std::sort(globalSettings.availableScore.begin(),
00956                           globalSettings.availableScore.end(),
00957                           ScoreSortByValue);
00958                 break;
00959         }
00960 
00961         WriteScore(m_controls.score.scoreText, globalSettings.availableScore);
00962     }
00963 }
00964 
00965 void AppManager::ExecuteMenu()
00966 {
00967     using namespace tbe::gui;
00968     using namespace tbe::scene;
00969 
00970     if(!globalSettings.noaudio && !globalSettings.nomusic)
00971         FMOD_System_PlaySound(m_fmodsys, FMOD_CHANNEL_FREE, m_mainMusic, false, &m_mainMusicCh);
00972 
00973     bool done = false;
00974     while(!done)
00975     {
00976         if(m_fpsMng->DoARender())
00977         {
00978             m_gameEngine->PollEvent();
00979 
00980             if(m_eventMng->notify == EventManager::EVENT_WIN_QUIT)
00981                 done = true;
00982 
00983             switch(m_guiManager->GetSession())
00984             {
00985                 case MENU_MAIN:
00986                     if(m_guiManager->GetControl("quit")->IsActivate())
00987                         done = true;
00988                     else
00989                         ProcessMainMenuEvent();
00990                     break;
00991 
00992                 case MENU_CAMPAIGN:
00993                     ProcessCampaignMenuEvent();
00994                     break;
00995 
00996                 case MENU_SCORE:
00997                     ProcessScoreMenuEvent();
00998                     break;
00999 
01000                 case MENU_SETTING_KEYS:
01001                     ProcessSettingKeyMenuEvent();
01002                     break;
01003 
01004                 case MENU_SETTING:
01005                     ProcessSettingMenuEvent();
01006                     break;
01007 
01008                 case MENU_ABOUT:
01009                     if(m_guiManager->GetControl("return")->IsActivate())
01010                         m_guiManager->SetSession(MENU_MAIN);
01011                     break;
01012 
01013                 case MENU_QUICKPLAY:
01014                     ProcessPlayMenuEvent();
01015                     break;
01016 
01017                 case MENU_EDIT:
01018                     ProcessEditMenuEvent();
01019                     break;
01020             }
01021 
01022             m_camera->SetPos(-m_camera->GetTarget() * 8.0f);
01023 
01024             m_logo->GetMatrix().SetRotateY(0.01);
01025 
01026             m_gameEngine->BeginScene();
01027 
01028             if(globalSettings.video.usePpe)
01029             {
01030                 Rtt* ppeRtt = m_ppeManager->GetRtt();
01031                 ppeRtt->Use(true);
01032                 ppeRtt->Clear();
01033                 m_sceneManager->Render();
01034                 ppeRtt->Use(false);
01035                 m_ppeManager->Render();
01036             }
01037 
01038             else
01039             {
01040                 m_sceneManager->Render();
01041             }
01042 
01043             m_guiManager->Render();
01044             m_gameEngine->EndScene();
01045         }
01046 
01047         m_fpsMng->Update();
01048     }
01049 }
01050 
01051 void AppManager::ExecuteGame(const Settings::PartySetting& playSetting)
01052 {
01053     cout << "--- ExecuteGame :" << endl
01054             << "  playLevel = " << playSetting.playMap.name << endl
01055             << "  playMod = " << playSetting.playMod << endl
01056             << "  playTime = " << playSetting.playTime << endl
01057             << "  playerCount = " << playSetting.playerCount << endl
01058             << "  playerModel = " << playSetting.playerName.file << endl
01059             << "  playerName = " << playSetting.playerName.name << endl;
01060 
01061     m_sceneManager->ClearAll();
01062     m_ppeManager->ClearAll();
01063 
01064     if(!globalSettings.noaudio && !globalSettings.nomusic)
01065         FMOD_Channel_Stop(m_mainMusicCh);
01066 
01067     // Affichage de l'ecran de chargement --------------------------------------
01068 
01069     m_guiManager->SetSession(MENU_LOAD);
01070 
01071     m_guiManager->GetControl<gui::TextBox > ("load:stateText")
01072             ->Write("Chargement en cours...");
01073 
01074     m_guiManager->UpdateLayout();
01075 
01076     m_gameEngine->BeginScene();
01077     m_guiManager->Render();
01078     m_gameEngine->EndScene();
01079 
01080     // Chargement de la carte --------------------------------------------------
01081 
01082     PlayManager* gameManager;
01083 
01084     switch(playSetting.playMod)
01085     {
01086         case FRAG: gameManager = new PlayFragManager(this);
01087             break;
01088         case ALONE: gameManager = new PlayAloneManager(this);
01089             break;
01090         case TEAM: gameManager = new PlayTeamManager(this);
01091             break;
01092         default:
01093             throw Exception("AppManager::ExecuteGame; Unknown mode type (%d)", playSetting.playMod);
01094     }
01095 
01096     gameManager->SetupMap(playSetting);
01097     gameManager->SetupGui();
01098 
01099     // Attente de réponse ------------------------------------------------------
01100 
01101     m_guiManager->SetSession(MENU_LOAD);
01102 
01103     m_guiManager->GetControl<gui::TextBox > ("load:stateText")
01104             ->Write("Appuyer sur \"Espace\" pour continuer...");
01105 
01106     m_eventMng->keyState[EventManager::KEY_SPACE] = false;
01107 
01108     while(!m_eventMng->keyState[EventManager::KEY_SPACE])
01109     {
01110         m_gameEngine->PollEvent();
01111         m_gameEngine->BeginScene();
01112         m_guiManager->Render();
01113         m_gameEngine->EndScene();
01114     }
01115 
01116     // Début du jeu ------------------------------------------------------------
01117 
01118     cout << "Start game" << endl;
01119 
01120     gameManager->OnStartGame();
01121 
01122     while(gameManager->running)
01123     {
01124         if(m_fpsMng->DoARender())
01125         {
01126             gameManager->EventProcess();
01127             gameManager->GameProcess();
01128             gameManager->HudProcess();
01129 
01130             gameManager->Render();
01131         }
01132 
01133         m_fpsMng->Update();
01134     }
01135 
01136     cout << "End game" << endl;
01137 
01138     delete gameManager;
01139 
01140     if(!globalSettings.noaudio && !globalSettings.nomusic)
01141         FMOD_System_PlaySound(m_fmodsys, FMOD_CHANNEL_FREE, m_mainMusic, false, &m_mainMusicCh);
01142 }
01143 
01144 void AppManager::ExecuteCampaign(const Settings::PartySetting& playSetting)
01145 {
01146     Settings::PartySetting curPlaySetting = playSetting;
01147 
01148     bool done = false;
01149 
01150     do
01151     {
01152         cout << "ExecuteCampaign :" << endl
01153                 << "playLevel = " << curPlaySetting.playMap.name << endl
01154                 << "playMod = " << curPlaySetting.playMod << endl
01155                 << "playTime = " << curPlaySetting.playTime << endl
01156                 << "playerCount = " << curPlaySetting.playerCount << endl
01157                 << "playerModel = " << curPlaySetting.playerName.file << endl
01158                 << "playerName = " << curPlaySetting.playerName.name << endl
01159                 << "winCond = " << curPlaySetting.winCond << endl;
01160 
01161         m_sceneManager->ClearAll();
01162         m_ppeManager->ClearAll();
01163 
01164         if(!globalSettings.noaudio && !globalSettings.nomusic)
01165             FMOD_Channel_Stop(m_mainMusicCh);
01166 
01167         // Affichage de l'ecran de chargement --------------------------------------
01168 
01169         m_guiManager->SetSession(MENU_LOAD);
01170 
01171         m_guiManager->GetControl<gui::TextBox > ("load:stateText")
01172                 ->Write(gui::GuiString("%s en mode %s\n"
01173                                        "Marquer %d points en %d sec pour passer au niveau suivant !\n"
01174                                        "Chargement en cours...",
01175                                        curPlaySetting.playMap.name.c_str(),
01176                                        UnsignedToPlayMod(curPlaySetting.playMod).c_str(),
01177                                        curPlaySetting.playTime,
01178                                        curPlaySetting.winCond));
01179 
01180         m_guiManager->UpdateLayout();
01181 
01182         m_gameEngine->BeginScene();
01183         m_guiManager->Render();
01184         m_gameEngine->EndScene();
01185 
01186         // Chargement de la carte --------------------------------------------------
01187 
01188         PlayManager* gameManager;
01189 
01190         switch(curPlaySetting.playMod)
01191         {
01192             case FRAG: gameManager = new PlayFragManager(this);
01193                 break;
01194             case ALONE: gameManager = new PlayAloneManager(this);
01195                 break;
01196             case TEAM: gameManager = new PlayTeamManager(this);
01197                 break;
01198             default:
01199                 throw Exception("AppManager::ExecuteGame; Unknown mode type (%d)", curPlaySetting.playMod);
01200         }
01201 
01202         gameManager->SetupMap(curPlaySetting);
01203         gameManager->SetupGui();
01204 
01205         // Attente de réponse ------------------------------------------------------
01206 
01207         m_guiManager->SetSession(MENU_LOAD);
01208 
01209         m_guiManager->GetControl<gui::TextBox > ("load:stateText")
01210                 ->Write(gui::GuiString("%s en mode %s\n"
01211                                        "Marquer %d points en %d sec pour passer au niveau suivant !\n"
01212                                        "Appuyer sur \"Espace\" pour continuer...",
01213                                        curPlaySetting.playMap.name.c_str(),
01214                                        UnsignedToPlayMod(curPlaySetting.playMod).c_str(),
01215                                        curPlaySetting.playTime,
01216                                        curPlaySetting.winCond));
01217 
01218         m_eventMng->keyState[EventManager::KEY_SPACE] = false;
01219 
01220         while(!m_eventMng->keyState[EventManager::KEY_SPACE])
01221         {
01222             m_gameEngine->PollEvent();
01223             m_gameEngine->BeginScene();
01224             m_guiManager->Render();
01225             m_gameEngine->EndScene();
01226         }
01227 
01228         // Début du jeu ------------------------------------------------------------
01229 
01230         cout << "Start game" << endl;
01231 
01232         gameManager->OnStartGame();
01233 
01234         while(gameManager->running)
01235         {
01236             if(m_fpsMng->DoARender())
01237             {
01238                 gameManager->EventProcess();
01239                 gameManager->GameProcess();
01240                 gameManager->HudProcess();
01241 
01242                 gameManager->Render();
01243             }
01244 
01245             m_fpsMng->Update();
01246         }
01247 
01248         cout << "End game" << endl;
01249 
01250         int score = gameManager->GetUserPlayer()->GetScore();
01251         done = !gameManager->IsGameOver();
01252 
01253         delete gameManager;
01254 
01255         if(!done && score >= (int)curPlaySetting.winCond
01256            && curPlaySetting.curLevel == globalSettings.profile.index)
01257         {
01258             cout << "Next level available" << endl;
01259 
01260             if(globalSettings.profile.index < globalSettings.campaign.maps.size())
01261             {
01262                 globalSettings.profile.index++;
01263                 curPlaySetting.curLevel = globalSettings.profile.index;
01264             }
01265 
01266             globalSettings.SaveProfiles();
01267 
01268             UpdateGuiContent();
01269 
01270             Settings::PartySetting nextParty = m_controls.campaign.levelSelect->GetData()
01271                     .GetValue<Settings::PartySetting > ();
01272 
01273             curPlaySetting.playMap = nextParty.playMap;
01274             curPlaySetting.playMod = nextParty.playMod;
01275             curPlaySetting.playTime = nextParty.playTime;
01276             curPlaySetting.playerCount = nextParty.playerCount;
01277             curPlaySetting.winCond = nextParty.winCond;
01278 
01279             // ---------------------------------------------------------------------
01280 
01281             m_guiManager->SetSession(MENU_LOAD);
01282 
01283             m_guiManager->GetControl<gui::TextBox > ("load:stateText")
01284                     ->Write(gui::GuiString("Nouveau niveau déploqué !\n"
01285                                            "Appuyer sur \"Espace\" pour continuer...", curPlaySetting.winCond));
01286 
01287             if(!globalSettings.noaudio)
01288                 FMOD_System_PlaySound(m_fmodsys, FMOD_CHANNEL_FREE, m_gongSound, false, 0);
01289 
01290             m_screenWaitClock.SnapShoot();
01291 
01292             m_eventMng->keyState[EventManager::KEY_SPACE] = false;
01293             while(!m_eventMng->keyState[EventManager::KEY_SPACE]
01294                   || !m_screenWaitClock.IsEsplanedTime(1000))
01295             {
01296                 m_gameEngine->PollEvent();
01297                 m_gameEngine->BeginScene();
01298                 m_guiManager->Render();
01299                 m_gameEngine->EndScene();
01300             }
01301         }
01302         else if(globalSettings.profile.index >= globalSettings.campaign.maps.size())
01303         {
01304             m_guiManager->SetSession(MENU_LOAD);
01305 
01306             m_guiManager->GetControl<gui::TextBox > ("load:stateText")
01307                     ->Write(gui::GuiString("FELECITATION JEU TERMINER !!!\n"
01308                                            "Appuyer sur \"Espace\" pour continuer...", curPlaySetting.winCond));
01309 
01310             if(!globalSettings.noaudio)
01311                 FMOD_System_PlaySound(m_fmodsys, FMOD_CHANNEL_FREE, m_gongSound, false, 0);
01312 
01313             m_screenWaitClock.SnapShoot();
01314 
01315             m_eventMng->keyState[EventManager::KEY_SPACE] = false;
01316             while(!m_eventMng->keyState[EventManager::KEY_SPACE]
01317                   || !m_screenWaitClock.IsEsplanedTime(1000))
01318             {
01319                 m_gameEngine->PollEvent();
01320                 m_gameEngine->BeginScene();
01321                 m_guiManager->Render();
01322                 m_gameEngine->EndScene();
01323             }
01324         }
01325     }
01326     while(!done);
01327 
01328     if(!globalSettings.noaudio && !globalSettings.nomusic)
01329         FMOD_System_PlaySound(m_fmodsys, FMOD_CHANNEL_FREE, m_mainMusic, false, &m_mainMusicCh);
01330 }
01331 
01332 void AppManager::ExecuteEditor(const Settings::EditSetting& editSetting)
01333 {
01334     cout << "ExecuteEditor" << endl;
01335 
01336     m_sceneManager->ClearAll();
01337     m_ppeManager->ClearAll();
01338 
01339     if(!globalSettings.noaudio && !globalSettings.nomusic)
01340         FMOD_Channel_Stop(m_mainMusicCh);
01341 
01342     // Affichage de l'ecran de chargement --------------------------------------
01343 
01344     m_guiManager->SetSession(MENU_LOAD);
01345 
01346     m_guiManager->GetControl<gui::TextBox > ("load:stateText")
01347             ->Write("Chargement en cours...");
01348 
01349     m_guiManager->UpdateLayout();
01350 
01351     m_gameEngine->BeginScene();
01352     m_guiManager->Render();
01353     m_gameEngine->EndScene();
01354 
01355     // Chargement de la carte --------------------------------------------------
01356 
01357     EditorManager* editorManager = new EditorManager(this);
01358 
01359     editorManager->SetupMap(editSetting);
01360     editorManager->SetupGui();
01361 
01362     // Attente de réponse ------------------------------------------------------
01363 
01364     m_guiManager->SetSession(MENU_LOAD);
01365 
01366     m_guiManager->GetControl<gui::TextBox > ("load:stateText")
01367             ->Write("Appuyer sur \"Espace\" pour continuer...");
01368 
01369     while(!m_eventMng->keyState[EventManager::KEY_SPACE])
01370     {
01371         m_gameEngine->PollEvent();
01372         m_gameEngine->BeginScene();
01373         m_guiManager->Render();
01374         m_gameEngine->EndScene();
01375     }
01376 
01377     // Début du jeu ------------------------------------------------------------
01378 
01379     while(editorManager->running)
01380     {
01381         if(m_fpsMng->DoARender())
01382         {
01383             editorManager->EventProcess();
01384             editorManager->HudProcess();
01385 
01386             editorManager->Render();
01387         }
01388 
01389         m_fpsMng->Update();
01390     }
01391 
01392     delete editorManager;
01393 
01394     if(!globalSettings.noaudio && !globalSettings.nomusic)
01395         FMOD_System_PlaySound(m_fmodsys, FMOD_CHANNEL_FREE, m_mainMusic, false, &m_mainMusicCh);
01396 }
